projects.title: The Vāda Project (2022)
projects.description: I developed and maintain a web app actively used by the KSU Philosophy department to teach Buddhist-Indian logic. It faciliates classroom debate through pramāṇa-vādas (lit. "ways of knowing").

image.alt: A screenshot of the Vada Project

projects.title: myTime calendar exporter (2024)
projects.description: I developed a web scraper to retrieve shift schedules from a company's internal scheduling application, and store them as an ICS file for use in 3rd party calendar applications.

image.alt: A screenshot of macOS calendar showing shifts
